To our knowledge, only limited data are available about mtRNA expression in PBMC from HBV infected patients
9 . In our study, we evidenced a significantly lower mtRNA concentration in HBV infected patients exposed to NA therapy with respect to HBV infected na√Øve patients and HBV negative controls. In addition, NA-treated patients with BSC have significantly lower levels of mtRNA when compared with those without. We also found a significant negative correlation between mtRNA levels and NA therapy duration.
